page.title: 14THE INDUCTION
page.content:
The living of St.Michael and All Angels, Marbury had been vacant since the retirement of the previous vicar on New Year's Eve,1984.The church was then dependent on visiting clergy and lay readers during this interregnum. On Wednesday 17th July 1985,the induction of the Reverend Victor A.M. Trill took place.The service was conducted by the Archdeacon of Chester the Venerable H.L.Williams,and collation by the Rt.Rev.Ronald Brown Lord Bishop of Birkenhead.
A six year old's impression of the service.
I went to church with Mummy,Louise, Granny and Grandad.I sat on Granny's knee because my legs were getting
